text:
This is something that should be directly addressed to the CRAN team. I think the wording is a defensive stand on complains about not receiving notifications from CRAN about being archived or not attempting to do so.
Sometimes it is important to keep that in mind

Perhaps a way to avoid this problem would be state that it was notified on X date or after an allocated period of time.
> Archived on 2025-09-20 as errors were not corrected since 2025-08-30
Or
> Archived on 2025-09-20 as errors were not corrected in 3 weeks.

text:
I would tweak other parts of the message displayed on archived packages too.
I wish it was clearer that packages are still on CRAN but not available to install by default. The removed wording on the first sentence and the next sentence of the archive cause misunderstandings.
